### Model
```mermaid
erDiagram
    Person {
        int id
        string name
        string phoneNumber
    }

    Account {
        int id
        string name
    }

    Budget {
        int id
        double money
    }

    Category {
        int id
        string name
    }

    Expense {
        int id
        string name
        string description
        list_string_ tags
        datetime date
        double amount
    }

    Debt {
        int id
        double amount
        datetime date
        string note
        list_string_ tags
        double paidAmount
    }

    Person ||--o{ Debt : "is creditor"
    Person ||--o{ Debt : "is debtor"
    Person }o--|| Expense : "pays"
    Person }o--o{ Expense : "participates in"

    Account ||--|{ Expense : "has"

    Budget ||--o{ Category : "has"
    Category }o--o| Budget : "belongs to"

    Category ||--o{ Expense : "contains"

    Expense }|--o| Debt : "results in"
    Expense }o--|| Category : "is classified as"
    Expense }o--|| Account : "is recorded in"

    Debt }o--|| Expense : "originates from"
```
